name: Ace of Spades
desc:
If you like to <input type="text" value="" data-result="gamble" />, I tell you I'm your <input type="text" value="" data-result="man" />
You <input type="text" value="" data-result="win" /> some, <input type="text" value="" data-result="lose" /> some, it's - all - the same to me
The pleasure is to <input type="text" value="" data-result="play" />, it makes no difference what you <input type="text" value="" data-result="say" />
I don't <input type="text" value="" data-result="share" /> your greed, the only <input type="text" value="" data-result="card" /> I need is
The Ace Of Spades
The Ace Of Spades

Playing for the <input type="text" value="" data-result="high" /> one, dancing with the <input type="text" value="" data-result="devil" />,
Going with the flow, it's all a <input type="text" value="" data-result="game" /> to me,
Seven or Eleven, <input type="text" value="" data-result="snake" /> eyes watching you,
Double up or <input type="text" value="" data-result="quit" />, double stakes or <input type="text" value="" data-result="split" />,
The Ace Of Spades
The Ace Of Spades

You know I'm born to <input type="text" value="" data-result="lose" />, and gambling's for <input type="text" value="" data-result="fools" />,
But that's the way I <input type="text" value="" data-result="like" /> it baby,
I don't wanna live <input type="text" value="" data-result="forever" />,
And don't forget the <input type="text" value="" data-result="joker" />!

Pushing <input type="text" value="" data-result="up" /> the ante, I know you've got to <input type="text" value="" data-result="see" /> me,
Read 'em and weep, the <input type="text" value="" data-result="dead" /> man's hand again,
I see it in your <input type="text" value="" data-result="eyes" />, take one <input type="text" value="" data-result="look" /> and die,
The only thing you <input type="text" value="" data-result="see" />, you know it's gonna be,
The Ace Of Spades
The Ace Of Spades
